summary: A Swedish housewife begins an adulterous affair with a foreign archaeologist. But he is an emotionally scarred man, a Jewish survivor from a concentration camp, consequently, their relationship will be painfully difficult.
cast: Elliott Gould|Bibi Andersson|Max von Sydow|Sheila Reid|Margaretha Byström|Elsa Ebbesen|Dennis Gotobed|Karin Gry|Staffan Hallerstam|Barbro Hiort af Ornäs|Åke Lindström|Ann-Christin Lobråten|Maria Nolgård|Erik Nyhlén|Bengt Ottekil|Alan Simon|Per Sjöstrand|Aino Taube|Mimmo Wåhlander|Carol Zavis
title: La carcoma
